message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I know it's worth a lot to you, so I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Can you meet me at $8,000?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is below what I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $8,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still trying to save some money. Can you meet me at $8,250?
Bob, I'm seeing some progress here.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $8,500? This is a fair offer considering the value you're getting.
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still looking to save some money. Can you meet me at $7,750?
